name: Capspore Demo
description:
Welcome to Capspore! 

Capspore is an exploration platformer with fun combat. 

This is only the prototype version! The full game will probably be released sometime in August. If you have feedback, let me know in the comments so I can make the game even better!

-- Controls -- 

Keyboard:

WASD to move, space to jump, J/Left click to attack, ENTER to pause, and Shift to switch abilities.

Controller:

D-Pad to move, B (bottom button) to jump, Y (left button) to attack, Start to pause, and Right Shoulder to switch abilities.

--A few things about the controls--

Double-press a direction (left or right) to start sprinting.

There are different moves for when you're idle, walking, and sprinting! Be sure to try them out! You can view the abilities's info by going to the pause menu and clicking on the icons for the hat.
